apiKey.label: Nyne API Key
apiKey.help: Your API key from nyne.ai (or use ${NYNE_API_KEY})

apiSecret.label: Nyne API Secret
apiSecret.help: Your API secret from nyne.ai (or use ${NYNE_API_SECRET})

debug.label: Debug Logging
debug.help: Enable verbose debug logs for API calls and responses

defaultPollTimeout.label: Poll Timeout (seconds)
defaultPollTimeout.help: Maximum time to wait for async API results (default: 60s)
